title: Notwithstanding the above restrictions as stated in TableNo
clause_text: Notwithstanding the above restrictions as stated in TableNo.15, for cinema/TV films production, shooting, editing, recording studios, more height as required for their effective functioning shall be permitted. * Subject to the special permission of the Commissioner greater height may be permitted.
